Why Drive for Dot Transportation?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”1px|auto||auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://youtu.be/m1Cxj7VO1TI” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” ul_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#333″ header_2_font_size=”30px” custom_padding=”60px|75px|||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’re not here to sugar-coat things—you know as well as we do that being a professional truck driver is hard work. And, honestly, switching jobs can be a hassle. But driving for Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) is a job change that’s worth the effort. Drive with us and you’ll reap the short– and long-term benefits of joining our team.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”55px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”5px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||9px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Great Place To Work®

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot Foods is proud to announce that we have officially been certified as a Great Place To Work®. This year, we partnered with Great Place To Work®—the global authority in workplace culture and most respected workplace recognition program—for our annual employee survey.

excerpt.rendered: 6 Reasons to Drive for DTIFull-time Dot drivers earn an average of $92K each year Learn MoreOne of the best benefits packages in the industry Learn MoreIn more than 30 years of operation, we’ve never had a layoff. Ever. Learn MoreDifferent schedules and job types to match your lifestyle Learn MoreDrive our top-of-the-line fleet made […]
